maintitle: Travel anywhere in the world with us
maintext_h1: Al-Rashid Tourism is an Uzbek-Arab company located in the city of Namangan, operating in the field of tourism in  Uzbekistan, and is a branch of the company Smart Solution for Business Men Services in Dubai / United Arab Emirates. We provide employment services outside Uzbekistan, any type of visa and residence for the Gulf countries,international and local tourist trips, booking tickets to any destination in the world on board all airlines.
footer_card: Choose the type of payment card!
paketlar_sayohat: Trips to many cities around the world
